div.l: Was non hardy þᵗat wente be þᵉ weye
That durste wᵗith here rage or onys pleye
But ȝif he wolde be slayn of symkyn
With panade or knyf or boytekyn
For Ielous folk ben ꝑperelous eủere mo
Algate þey wolde here wyuys wenden so
And ek for sche was sūmwhat smotyrlych
Sche was as dygne as watyr In a dich
And ful of hokyr ⁊and of bismerye
Sche thoughte þᵗat a lady schulde here spareye
What for here kynrede ⁊and here Norterye
That sche hadde lerned in þᵉ nūnnerye
A doughtyr hadde þey be twixe hēm too
Of twenty ȝer wᵗith outyn ony moo
Sauynge a chyld þᵗat was of sene ȝer age
In cradil it lay ⁊and was a propere page
This wenche thikke ⁊and wel I growȳn was
Wᵗith cāmmuse nose ⁊and eyen greye as glas
Buttokkys brode ⁊and brestis rounde ⁊and hye
But rygh fayr was here her I wele not lye
This persoıı̄un of the toıı̄un for sche was so fayr
In purpos was to makyn here hese eyr
But of hese catel ⁊and hese mesewage
And straıı̄unge he made it of here maryge
Hese purpos was for to be stowe here hye
In to sūm worthi blod of aıı̄unceterye
For holicherche good / mote ben dispendit
On holy cherchis blod / þᵗat is dessendit
Þ̉erfore he wolde / hese holy blod honoᵘure
Thow þᵗat he holy cherche / schulde devoure
Gret sokene hath / this mellere out of doute
Wᵗith whete ⁊and malt / of al the lond a boute
And namely þ̉ere was a gret college
Men clepyth þᵉ soler halle at cantebrege
There was heyre whete ⁊and here malt I groıı̄unde
And on a day it happede in a stoıı̄unde
